ingredients.item: 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, extra to drizzle

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6. Place the chicken in a small roasting tin and drizzle with a little oil, season. Bake for 15 minutes. Add the tomatoes and cook for a further 15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat.

Meanwhile, whisk together the oil and vinegar. Heat the lentils according to pack instructions and stir in the dressing along with the rocket and the tomatoes. Serve topped with the sliced chicken breasts.
